mapper.update: update t_emp set photo=#{photo} where id=#{id}
update t_emp set pass=#{pass} where id=#{id} and pass=#{name}
mapper.select: select e.id,e.name,e.pass,e.photo,e.flag,tl.createtime as loginDate from t_emp e inner join t_loginlog tl on e.no = tl.no and e.id=#{id} order by tl.id desc limit 0,1
